Text: Corporate Culture Committee Cc Culture Committee Members The next two meetings of Enrons new Corporate Culture Committee will be held on April and April in EB C Please note the change of location Let me know at your earliest if you will be able to attend these next two meetings Thanks Vanessa

Corporate Culture Committee Meeting Cc REMINDER The Corporate Culture Committee will be held tomorrow Thursday April from am pm in EB Lunch will be served Richard Lewis will be connected from London via teleconference and Kelly Kimberly will be calling in The numbers for the conference call are as follows Domestic and International The Participant Code is Please contact me x or Kathy McMahon x if you have any questions or require additional information Thanks Vanessa

Corporate Culture Committee Cc Culture Committee Members We are delighted that you are available to attend the first meeting of Enrons new Corporate Culture Committee This meeting will be held on Monday April from pm pm in EB C The executive directors of this committee Cindy Olson Beth Tilney and Kelly Kimberly are hoping that all members will be able to attend this very important kickoff meeting If you have any questions or require additional information please contact me at X Thanks Vanessa

March of Dimes Neiman Marcus Luncheon April Cc Enron has purchased a table to the Houston Chronicle Best Dressed Luncheon Neiman Marcus Fashion Show benefiting the March of Dimes The luncheon will be held on Wednesday April at the Westin Galleria The reception begins at am and the actual luncheon starts promptly at noon Cindy would like you be her guest at Enrons table Please let me know at your earliest convenience if you will be able to attend Thanks Vanessa

Matching gifts Cc match donations to the Zoo I dont know about employee discounts but Ill check Vanessa Forwarded by Vanessa BobCorpEnron on AM From Laura Schwartz AM To Vanessa NRON cc Subject Matching gifts Forwarded by Laura SchwartzCorpEnron on AM on AM To cc Subject Matching gifts Does Enron offer matching gifts or discounts to the Zoo

Career FairMany of the prospective employers who have been invited to the career fair have responded enthusiastically They know that Enron hires good people and they are interested in meeting you For those of you who have sent me a resume release form your resumes have been forwarded to interested companies To date we have companies that will be attending and are waiting to hear from others Their deadline for responding is Friday afternoon In case you would like to participate and you have not sent a release form and a resume to me please contact me at ext or via email If you plan to attend the career fair please respond to me no later than noon on Friday August and provide me with your name as you wish it to appear on your name tag Members of the Resource Management Team will be at the career fair to assist you with networking As a reminder you might want to consider wearing business attire as you would for an interview outside of Enron and please bring extra copies of your resume I look forward to seeing you there Joan Woodson
